description: Lists the tags associated with the specified report definition.

parameters.name: ReportName
parameters.description: The report name of the report definition that tags are to be returned for.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: The tags assigned to the report definition resource.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The key of the tag. Tag keys are case sensitive. Each report definition can only have up to one tag with the same key. If you try to add an existing tag with the same key, the existing tag value will be updated to the new value.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value of the tag. Tag values are case-sensitive. This can be an empty string.
